name: api_utility_Profiler

properties.name: AddFramesFromFile
properties.description: Displays the recorded profile data in the profiler.

properties.name: BeginSample
properties.description: Begin profiling a piece of code with a custom label.

properties.name: BeginThreadProfiling
properties.description: Enables profiling on the thread from which you call this method.

properties.name: EmitFrameMetaData
properties.description: Write metadata associated with the current frame to the Profiler stream.

properties.name: EmitSessionMetaData
properties.description: Write metadata associated with the whole Profiler session capture.

properties.name: EndSample
properties.description: Ends the current profiling sample.

properties.name: EndThreadProfiling
properties.description: Frees the internal resources used by the Profiler for the thread.

properties.name: GetAllCategories
properties.description: Returns all ProfilerCategory registered in Profiler.

properties.name: GetAllocatedMemoryForGraphicsDriver
properties.description: Returns the estimated amount of allocated memory for the graphics driver, in bytes.

properties.name: GetAreaEnabled
properties.description: Returns whether or not a given ProfilerArea is currently enabled.

properties.name: GetCategoriesCount
properties.description: Returns number of ProfilerCategory registered in Profiler.

properties.name: GetMonoHeapSizeLong
properties.description: Returns the size of the reserved space for managed-memory.

properties.name: GetMonoUsedSizeLong
properties.description: Gets the allocated managed memory for live objects and non-collected objects.

properties.name: GetRuntimeMemorySizeLong
properties.description: Gathers the native-memory used by a Unity object.

properties.name: GetTempAllocatorSize
properties.description: Returns the size of the temp allocator.

properties.name: GetTotalAllocatedMemoryLong
properties.description: The total memory allocated by the internal allocators in Unity. Unity reserves large pools of memory

properties.name: GetTotalFragmentationInfo
properties.description: Returns heap memory fragmentation information.

properties.name: GetTotalReservedMemoryLong
properties.description: The total memory Unity has reserved.

properties.name: GetTotalUnusedReservedMemoryLong
properties.description: Unity allocates memory in pools for usage when unity needs to allocate memory. This function returns

properties.name: IsCategoryEnabled
properties.description: Returns whether or not a given ProfilerCategory is currently enabled.
